title.narrative: Young African Leaders Initiative (YALI) - Kuanza Dreams

description.narrative: Kuanza Dreams, using a farm to table service model, will provide a platform for people in Siphocosini to order fresh, locally grown, organic Fruits and Vegetables to be delivered directly to their houses on the same day or pick up service.
